description.b: Follow the steps below to modernize your project.

item.title: Load configuration suggestion

description.b: At first step, load any configuration suggestions deriving from the pre-migration steps.

item.onCompletion: Following steps have been configured with business and technical suggestions based on the pre-migration results.

subitem.label: Select and open legacy PIM view
Use the Requirements Specification tool (GML Editor) to annotate the selected PIM with requirements.
Include the following requirements: (1) PIM: AWS and (2) Back-end component: highly scalable database.
Annotate PSM with monitoring and billing components.

item.title: Select Cloud target

description.b: Use the Requirements Specification Tool (RST) to select the optimal Cloud target for your application. If you have already selected a Cloud target and don't want to change it, click 'Skip' to skip this part.

subitem.label: Select and open the annotated with requirements legacy PIM view (from previous step). Skip this step if PIM is already selected.
Use RST to match and rank the best Cloud environments against your PIM.
Browse through the ranked list of matching Cloud environments models and select one.

item.onCompletion: On completion of the steps above, a target Cloud environment for modernizing and deploying your application will be selected.

item.title: Cloudify and optimize application features

subitem.label: Select and open legacy PIM view. Skip this step if PIM is already selected.
Use Optimization Tool to cloudify the selected PIM

Ensure that: (1) Data schema re-factoring and optimization should target NoSQL persistence frameworks, (2) Data dump transformation to fit the data into the target NoSQL persistence frameworks, and (3) Persistence layer adaptation should be based on the selected target NoSQL persistence frameworks.
Ensure that the monitoring component is created at PSM level before proceeding to the next step.
Now use the Optimization Tool to optimize the generated cloudified PIM

item.onCompletion: The cloudified PSM view has been generated.

description.b: Migration phase is complete. You may now choose to proceed to post-migration phase.
